title: Coinbase Exec Talks About Impact of U.S. Spot Bitcoin Approval on $30 Trillion U.S. Wealth Management Industry
description: In an interview with CNBC on 2 January 2024, Hassan Ahmed, the Country Director for Singapore at Coinbase, shared his thoughts on the potential impact of U.S. SEC-approved spot Bitcoin ETFs on the cryptocurrency market. Ahmed emphasized the foundational nature of a U.S. spot Bitcoin ETF, describing it as a “structural market change” for cryptocurrencies. […]

title: Defi Platform Radiant Capital Loses Digital Assets Worth $4.5 Million After Flash Loan Attack
description: Radiant Capital, a decentralized finance (defi) platform, confirmed on Jan. 3, 2023, that it fell victim to an attack which saw the “protocol accruing bad debt in the WETH market, totaling about 1.3% of total protocol TVL” or $4.5 million. Radiant Capital has urged the hackers to establish contact with the defi platform before law […]

title: Decentralized exchange dYdX exposes details of $9 million attack on its v3 platform
description: Decentralized exchange dYdX has released a post-mortem report regarding a “targeted attack” on its v3 platform in November, resulting in a $9 million loss in its insurance fund, equivalent to approximately 40% of the total fund. The exchange’s investigation has identified the attacker’s identity, and legal actions are being considered against the perpetrator. dYdX attacker’s […]

title: Ark Invest sells more Coinbase shares worth $25.3M
description: In a recent trade filing, Cathie Wood’s Ark Invest has continued its selling spree of Coinbase Global Inc. shares, disposing of an additional 166,183 shares, valued at approximately $25.3 million, on Wednesday. This move follows a series of recent sell-offs by the investment firm, which have already seen them offload over $200 million of Coinbase […]

title: South Korea proposes amendment to restrict credit card use for crypto purchases
description: The Financial Services Commission (FSC) of South Korea, the nation’s top financial regulator, has proposed to amend the Credit Finance Act, prohibiting its citizens from utilizing credit cards to purchase cryptocurrencies.  This move comes as a response to concerns regarding the illegal flow of domestic funds, money laundering, and the promotion of speculative behavior through […]

title: EU Grants Medical Device Certification to iRhythm’s Zio Wearable ECG with AI Detection of Heart Problems
description: In a groundbreaking development in cardiac healthcare, iRhythm Technologies has received European Union (EU) medical device certification for its innovative Zio wearable ECG (Electrocardiogram). This cutting-edge device combines the power of artificial intelligence (AI) with extensive machine learning to accurately detect cardiac arrhythmias, providing a level of precision equivalent to that of a medical professional. […]
